name: Bayonet Ring
description: Costs 100% of the weapon's cost. Allows a melee weapon to be mounted on a ranged weapon.

name: Bipod
description: Stabilizing legs for ranged weapons, improving accuracy when properly deployed.

name: Double Trigger
description: Allows a weapon to fire two shots with a single trigger pull.

name: Ion Charger
description: Infuses weapon strikes with ion energy, dealing additional ion damage.

name: Missile Load
description: Allows a weapon to fire missiles or mini-grenades instead of standard ammunition.

name: Neutronium Reinforcement
description: Reinforces weapon with ultra-hard neutronium alloy, increasing its durability and damage.

name: Overload Switch
description: Allows weapon to be overloaded for increased output at risk of malfunction.

name: Pulse Charger
description: Adds energy pulses to weapon strikes, increasing damage output.

name: Rangefinder
description: Electronic rangefinding system for improved accuracy at distance.

name: Rapid Recycler
description: Recycles spent ammunition for immediate reuse, increasing firing capacity.

name: Retractable Stock
description: Allows weapon stock to retract for compact storage. Uses 1 slot if folding mechanism adds significant complexity.

name: Slinker
description: Silences weapon fire and suppresses energy signatures for stealth operations.

name: Sniper Switch
description: Converts weapon to single-shot precision mode for long-range accuracy.

name: Targeting Scope, Standard
description: Standard magnifying scope for ranged weapons, improving accuracy.

name: Targeting Scope, Low-Light
description: Advanced low-light targeting scope for use in darkness or poor visibility.

name: Beam Splitter
source: Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide
description: Splits energy weapon output into multiple beams for spread damage.

name: Durasteel Bonding
source: Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide
description: Bonds weapon with durasteel plating for superior durability.

name: Enhanced Energy Projector
source: Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide
description: Upgrades weapon's energy projection system for increased output.

name: Hair Trigger
source: Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide
description: Ultra-sensitive trigger mechanism for faster firing.

name: Improved Energy Cell
source: Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide
description: High-capacity energy cell for extended firing duration.

name: Tremor Cell
source: Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide
description: Adds shockwave effect to weapon strikes, affecting area around target.

name: Computerized Interface Scope
description: Integrates digital targeting computer for tactical advantage.

name: Flash Suppressor/Silencer
description: Suppresses muzzle flashes and reduces weapon discharge noise.
